description:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass "Legendary Town Building Set". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

A BGM pack provided as a part of "Legendary Town Building Set" Season Pass.

This pack features arranged versions of selected tracks from various previous titles in Atelier series.
Note: BGM can be changed from Extra - Music Gallery.
name: Atelier 20th Anniversary Arranged BGM Pack
